description: The tnEthRingPathFwdStateChange is generated when an Ethernet Ring
Path changes its forwarding state (tnEthRingPathFwdState) from
blocked to unblocked or from unblocked to blocked.
The value of tnEthRingPathFwdState indicates whether the Ethernet
Ring Node Path blocks the transmission and reception of traffic on the
ring port.
variables.name: TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingPathFwdState

description: The tnEthRingApsPrvsnRaiseAlarm is generated when an Ethernet Ring
provisioning mismatch is detected. A mismatch occurs when the RPL Owner
Node receives one or more No Request R-APS message(s) with RPL Blocked
status flag set (NR,RB) and a Node ID that differs from its own.
REFERENCE Draft ITU-T Recommendation G.8032/Y.1344 Version 2
Section 10.27
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingApsPrvsnRaiseAlarm TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingTxApsPdu s EXAMPLEEXAMPLE TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingPathRxApsPdu s EXAMPLEEXAMPLE TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingDefectStatus b 0

description: The value of tnEthRingTxApsPdu indicates the contents of the R-APS
PDU transmitted on the Ethernet Ring.
variables.name: TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingTxApsPdu

description: The value of tnEthRingPathRxApsPdu indicates the contents of the
R-APS PDU received on the Ethernet Ring path.
variables.name: TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingPathRxApsPdu

description: The value of tnEthRingDefectStatus indicates what defects are
active on the Ethernet Ring.
The defects are defined as:
dFopPM -- Provisioning Mismatch
variables.name: TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingDefectStatus

description: The tnEthRingApsPrvsnClearAlarm is generated when an Ethernet Ring
provisioning mismatch is cleared.
REFERENCE Draft ITU-T Recommendation G.8032/Y.1344 Version 2
Section 10.27

event.Summary: Ethernet ring provisioning mismatch alarm cleared

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingApsPrvsnClearAlarm TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingTxApsPdu s EXAMPLEEXAMPLE TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingPathRxApsPdu s EXAMPLEEXAMPLE TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingDefectStatus b 0

description: The value of tnEthRingTxApsPdu indicates the contents of the R-APS
PDU transmitted on the Ethernet Ring.
variables.name: TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingTxApsPdu

description: The value of tnEthRingPathRxApsPdu indicates the contents of the
R-APS PDU received on the Ethernet Ring path.
variables.name: TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingPathRxApsPdu

description: The value of tnEthRingDefectStatus indicates what defects are
active on the Ethernet Ring.
The defects are defined as:
dFopPM -- Provisioning Mismatch
variables.name: TN-ETH-RING-MIB::tnEthRingDefectStatus
